query.statement: UPDATE FMM_RECIPE_ITEM SET ITEM_CODE = #ITEM_CODE# , ITEM_SEQ = #ITEM_SEQ# , ORDER_YN = #ORDER_YN# , PR_ID = #PR_ID# , PR_NUM = NULL , PR_QTY = #PR_QTY# , UNIT_PRICE = #UNIT_PRICE# , OP_RATE = #OP_RATE# , OP_PRICE = #OP_PRICE# WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND MENU_CD = #MENU_CD# AND RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD# AND ITEM_CODE = #PRE_ITEM_CODE#
